attributes.action: Urge the UN to stop the advance on Sirte as it will be a Massacre in the name of revenge
attributes.additional_details:
If the 'Rebels' are allowed to march onto Sirte under the guise of 'Gadaffi hunting' it will be a massacre of civillians by the rebels and will have nothing to do with liberating Libya.. only revenge.

The west should not let this happen, as seen already the 'rebels' have been executing anyone they 'believe' is an enemy including children.

The UN has the power to halt this march onto Sirte and should act to protect the civillians in Sirte, not turn a blind eye to the rebels war crimes.
